title: Ask someone who has had 27 accounts perma banned anything
body:
As stated above, played since early season 2, had 27 accounts perma-banned {{summoner:14}}  and got three other accounts leading towards a perma.

Ask me anything

replies.body: are you tyler 1?
lol my comment got removed without being resolved. It is still a valid question given the content of the OP's OP.
About as valid as "Do you like ice cream?" and a lot less ok.

come on dude its clearly a troll AMA deserving of troll questions.

http://vignette4.wikia.nocookie.net/familyguy/images/3/33/Buzz_Killington.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20090720220816
Troll questions are fine, rule breaking ones are not. Soz but dems the rules.
The green has changed you man.

> [{quoted}](name=Essembie,realm=OCE,application-id=T8eq2lFQ,discussion-id=2fjEiGNB,comment-id=00020000000000000000,timestamp=2017-01-28T19:44:13.500+0000)
>
> The green has changed you man.

I litkerally have no idea who the green man was. Did they name change or somethin????
probs not even a senior member tbh
Hardly, I would have found your comment distasteful regardless.

lol. why do you even play lol? If you're offended at "pee pee" I can only assume that you cry yourself to sleep after reading in-game chat in an average game.

Oh well - seems I have a much MUCH higher threshold for profanity than your good self. But still - very surprised at your puritan reaction to "pee pee". Very surprised.

It was less the choice of words and more the context and intent. What I am offended by is irrelevant to the rules, hence the removal, but just because I found it distasteful when said to a stranger, doesn't mean I'd be offended if you said it to me.
http://www.smh.com.au/nsw/road-safety-ad-shows-size-does-matter-when-engaging-young-male-egos-20140110-30mjz.html

> [{quoted}](name=Essembie,realm=OCE,application-id=T8eq2lFQ,discussion-id=2fjEiGNB,comment-id=000200000000000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2017-01-30T09:46:28.184+0000)
>
> http://www.smh.com.au/nsw/road-safety-ad-shows-size-does-matter-when-engaging-young-male-egos-20140110-30mjz.html

I remember this shit lmao
I just wanted to trigger Seras ;)
You'll have to try harder than that m8

They based a national road safety campaign played at all hours of the day across a broad range of media on the essence of what you found distasteful, ie a suggestion that someone engaging in negative behaviour has a small pee pee. That was the whole premise of the campaign rolled out in print, on line, and on television.

The  green has made you giddy with power. You're not thinking straight at all and the more you defend your wobbly position the more giddy you get.
did you get this offended by the road safety ads?
You can believe what you wish about my perspective, but the fact remains that you broke the rules. It was a jerk thing to say and you know it, regardless of the content of the OP.

What were the permas for? Speech in game or actual behaviour (inting etc). I feel with league that perma chat bans would be better than perma bans if you were banned for "toxic language". I mean my friend has been permad 10+ times for "toxic language" and each time he just makes a new account. I know if he just had a perma chat restriction he would eventually get used to not being able to type and just play the game.
Do you like wasting everybody's time and/or resources, be it your countless teammates', the Rioters' (perma ban can only be handed out after a manual review), mine and your own?
is this bait?
